Articles.Content:
pic 1... This to show the three main parts and 'station spacers' ( four liquid fuel manual and remote operated spacers to join multiple station rings together side by side or turn the station into a ball-like station with two other halves atatched to the sides.. thats the plan anyway ) Hope to try that soon...

Pic 2.... The station all together all nice and shiny! I built this in sand box mode to get an idea of what I want to try and accomplish in the career mode. I wanted the station to do just two things, be a scientific mobile station and act as a stepping stone for easier access to the mun.

pic 3.... Here is the top half in transit.

pic 3.... The first section in space and I ran out of fuel... A quick re-fuel and off we go again!

pic 4.... moving into position...

pic 5.... Almost there! This is the point where im thinking have i just spent all day getting this thing up here only for the parts to not want to join or worse yet impode

Well if you like this Ill try add some progress pics and other possibilities with this station...I havnt thought of a name so let me know if you have any ideas

InB4 "You can screenshot with F1"

The 'I took the pics with my mobile phone' effect makes these look pretty good, it doesn't usually I accept, but here it looks more like video from a nearby vessel, I like it

Yeah some were taken with my phone, the first two are frapps screen shot, no more phone pics then I never thought of the ship to ship camera tho Im sure ive bashed f1 a few times....hmm mebe theres some pics hiding somewhere in the void of my hdd
Any chance you could get a craft file uploaded?
Yeah no problem! As soon as Ive worked out how to do it

You can upload the craft file to dropbox, or just the contents to pastebin

Mediafire works too, sometimes.

Ring station....https://www.dropbox.com/sh/xdhh3in7k2dgw2t/kPS5e6zLWp

Let me know if theres a problem with the link..im new to this Also please remember this station is a work in progress and far from perfect
This is too good for me to believe that this is your first station.
My first station was a mere bunch of ships stuck together.. this is my first purpose built station tho
